dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.util

Class RIR<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.lib2.util.swt.RIR<T>
      • dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.util.RIR<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dreisoft.tresos.lib2.util.swt.IR

    public abstract class RIR<T>
extends dreisoft.tresos.lib2.util.swt.RIR<T>
    An UI runnable with a result. Using this class only makes sense when running synchronously.
    Since:
    23.1

      Stores a Throwable which occurred during execution of this runnable

      • setThrowableWhileExecution

        public void setThrowableWhileExecution(java.lang.Throwable t)
        Stores a Throwable which occurred during execution of this runnable
        Use this with care - you should e.g. set it back to null when using one instance multiple times
        Overrides:
        setThrowableWhileExecution in class dreisoft.tresos.lib2.util.swt.RIR<T>
        Parameters:
        t - The Throwable to remember
        Since:
        23.1

      • getOccurredThrowable

        public java.lang.Throwable getOccurredThrowable()
        Overrides:
        getOccurredThrowable in class dreisoft.tresos.lib2.util.swt.RIR<T>
        Returns:
        the exception stored with setThrowableWhileExecution(Throwable) (must be supported by executing thread handler) or null if there did not occur an Exception or Error
        Since:
        23.1
